A Star Is Born ”, the fourth remake of the original 1937 film. It stars Lady Gaga and Bradly Cooper who also directed the film. I can say the this is one of the best remakes of original movies I’ve ever seen before I ’ d already seen the first critically acclaimed remake of the movie that was released in 1954 starring Judy Garland and I really hoped that the newest one would be as good as that since I really liked it and these two brilliant stars nailed it with t heir fantastic performances and n ot to mention their great talent for singing though I am not that fan of Lady Gaga and only have listened to very major songs that she sings still having seen the movie I actually fell in love with her voice and a cting for the first time. The music that they play and sing along was quite modernised maybe for the people in this generation including me who actually often listen to more classic music like the Beatles or other 1950 -1 960 ’ s rock ‘ n ’ roll music than the modern nevertheless it really blew me away that I couldn ’ t keep my eyes off the screen especially while they are doing their gigs The story was kinda familiar coz of one of the remakes that I saw before as I said and it makes us a bit emotional for some scenes particularly the penultimate where her fame is getting bigger and bigger Dw I ’ m not gonna get into the story more further for not spoiling it so I could hear some people ’ s sobbing during the c redits Speaking of the c redits in Australia most people tend to leave theatre rooms when the movie has ended but this time they actually sat through the very end of the c redits that had some songs played and sung by Bradly Cooper from the movie which was beautiful :-) I really felt great after I saw it so I highly recommend it to you especially those who are a fan of either Lady Gaga or Bradly Cooper and musical movie lovers like me. Also it would probably be more fun if you have already seen one of the remakes to compare Thanks for reading my review astarisborn ladygaga bradlycooper 2018 movies moviereview.

ありがたい 当選 まし TIFF 鑑賞. 一番 真ん中 寄り とても 良い 席 鑑賞 感謝 いたし. サントラ 聴い 行こ 迷っ けど 全て 感動 劇場 味わお 思っ いつも 通り あえて 聴か 行き まし. 初め 方 音楽 音量 的 物足りない 感 けど ライブ シャロウ 最後 I'll never love again 演出 かーーー 思い まし. レディガガ もう 歌 うま すぎる 映画 じゃ 初めて 聴い 曲 だけ 感動 ちゃう よ なぁ ていう クオリティ 笑. クーパー とても 歌声 よく うまく 多才 すぎる でしょ ー 思い まし. 今回 レディガガ 演技 って どう だろ 思っ 観 まし. 普段 すごく ファン ていう わけ 素顔 よく わから 気 まし. 初め トイレ シーン とか 笑う シーン とか ちょっと 大丈夫 ？ 心配 けど クーパー 出会っ もう 自然 とても よかっ. トークショー LiLiCo 言っ クーパー フェロモン やばい. とにかく あんなに 髭 じゃ 胸毛 生え 飲ん くれ のに セクシー. クーパー じゃ たら 不潔 感 塊 だろ. タイトル アリー スター誕生 確か クーパー 重き 置か. なので タイトル 鵜呑み レディガガ サクセスストーリー 期待 観 たら なんか 違う かも ？ 思っ しまう かも なぁ 思い. ただ 音楽 良 すぎ 主演 2人 魅力 すごす ぎて タイトル とか 他 方 指摘 カメラワーク 不自然 なんて 後 言わ なけれ 気 まんまと 爆 泣き しまっ でし ＼(^o^)／. 前作 観 今作 どう なのか とか 比べ. サントラ リピート 聴い. 今回 ドルビーアトモス 音響 よかっ けど もっともっと 聴き たい って 思っ 爆音 上映 たら 絶対 行く.
